short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check BD courier order ratio by entering a phone number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This platform enables you to easily verify the status of orders and courier services for customers in Bangladesh. By entering the customer's phone number, you can quickly access their parcel history, success rate, and information on order cancellations across various courier services. Our goal is to provide a simple and reliable service for businesses, enhancing customer satisfaction and reducing operational errors.
